list.name: Caffee Americano
list.description: A smooth and bold coffee made by diluting espresso with hot water, creating a lighter yet flavorful drink.

list.name: Espresso
list.description: A rich and intense coffee brewed by forcing hot water through finely ground coffee beans.

list.name: Espresso Doppio
list.description: A double shot of espresso, offering twice the intensity and flavor in every sip.

list.name: Espresso Macchiato
list.description: A bold shot of espresso topped with a small dollop of milk foam, balancing intensity with creaminess.

list.name: Espresso Con Panna
list.description: A decadent espresso shot topped with a dollop of whipped cream for a rich, creamy experience.

list.name: Espresso Romano
list.description: A unique espresso served with a slice of lemon to add a zesty twist to the bold flavor.

list.name: Affogato
list.description: A delightful combination of hot espresso poured over a scoop of vanilla ice cream, creating a rich dessert-drink.

list.name: Traditional Cappuccino
list.description: A classic cappuccino made with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam.

list.name: Bone Dry Cappuccino
list.description: A cappuccino made with just espresso and a thick layer of milk foam, no steamed milk.

list.name: Wet Cappuccino
list.description: A cappuccino with more steamed milk and less foam, making it creamier and smoother.

list.name: Dry Cappuccino
list.description: A cappuccino made with a thick layer of foam and little to no steamed milk.

list.name: Classic Latte
list.description: A smooth and creamy latte made with espresso and steamed milk, topped with a thin layer of milk foam.

list.name: Iceed Latte
list.description: A latte with added flavor syrups like vanilla, caramel, or hazelnut for a sweet twist.

list.name: Matcha Latte
list.description: A creamy latte made with matcha powder, steamed milk, and a subtle sweetness.

list.name: Chai Latte
list.description: A spiced latte made with chai tea concentrate, steamed milk, and a perfect blend of spices.

list.name: Golden Latte
list.description: A warm, golden drink made with turmeric, steamed milk, and a hint of cinnamon and honey.

list.name: Latte Macchiato
list.description: A layered drink with espresso poured over steamed milk, topped with a light layer of foam.

list.name: Caramel Macchiato
list.description: A sweet macchiato made with caramel syrup, espresso, steamed milk, and a touch of foam.

list.name: Mocha Macchiato
list.description: A decadent macchiato made with espresso, chocolate syrup, steamed milk, and milk foam.

list.name: Dry Macchiato
list.description: A macchiato with a strong espresso base and a thick, dry layer of milk foam.

list.name: Classic Lemonade
list.description: Refreshing lemonade made with fresh lemon juice, water, and sugar.

list.name: Pink Lemonade
list.description: A sweet and tangy lemonade with a splash of cranberry or raspberry juice.

list.name: Mint Lemonade
list.description: A cooling lemonade infused with fresh mint leaves for a refreshing flavor.

list.name: Strawberry Lemonade
list.description: A fruity lemonade made with fresh strawberries blended into the mix.

list.name: Blueberry Lemonade
list.description: A tangy-sweet lemonade blended with fresh or pureed blueberries.

list.name: Black Tea
list.description: Strong, robust, and often has malty or floral notes.

list.name: Green Tea
list.description: Light and refreshing with a grassy flavor.

list.name: White Tea
list.description: Delicate and slightly sweet, the least processed of all teas.

list.name: Oolong Tea
list.description: Partially fermented tea with a flavor profile between black and green tea.

list.name: Herbal Tea
list.description: Made from herbs, flowers, or fruits, with no tea leaves.

list.name: Chai
list.description: A spiced tea from India made with black tea, milk, sugar, and spices like cinnamon and cardamom.

list.name: Water
list.description: Still or sparkling water, available in various bottle sizes.

list.name: Juice
list.description: Fresh fruit juice: orange, apple, and mixed fruit blends.

list.name: Iced Tea
list.description: Ready-to-drink iced tea in flavors like lemon, peach, or unsweetened.

list.name: Whipped Cream
list.description: Light and fluffy whipped cream that adds a creamy and sweet touch to your coffee drinks.

list.name: Cinnamon
list.description: A sprinkle of cinnamon adds a warm and spicy flavor to your coffee.

list.name: Caramel Drizzle
list.description: Sweet caramel sauce drizzled over the top for a smooth and rich sweetness.

list.name: Marshmallows
list.description: Soft, fluffy marshmallows that melt into your hot drink, giving it a creamy texture.

list.name: Oreo Crumbles
list.description: Crushed Oreo cookies added for a sweet, crunchy texture and chocolate flavor.

list.name: Crushed Ice
list.description: Finely crushed ice for a refreshing and icy texture, perfect for iced coffee drinks.

list.name: Almond Flakes
list.description: Slivered almonds that add a nutty crunch and healthy fats to your coffee drink.

list.name: Cocoa Powder
list.description: A dusting of unsweetened cocoa powder adds a rich, chocolatey flavor to your drink.

list.name: Pumpkin Spice
list.description: A blend of cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger, and cloves, perfect for fall-inspired drinks.

list.name: Candy Cane Pieces
list.description: Crushed peppermint candy canes for a festive minty flavor in your winter drinks.

list.name: Matcha Powder
list.description: Green tea powder that gives a slightly bitter and earthy flavor to your coffee or latte.

list.name: Edible Flowers
list.description: Fresh flowers like lavender, rose petals, or violets for a delicate, aromatic touch.

list.name: Chocolate Cake
list.description: Rich and moist chocolate cake with a decadent chocolate frosting.

list.name: Cheesecake
list.description: Creamy cheesecake with a buttery graham cracker crust.

list.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
list.description: Classic chocolate chip cookies with a crispy edge and soft center.

list.name: Oatmeal Cookies
list.description: Chewy oatmeal cookies with a hint of cinnamon.

list.name: Croissant
list.description: Flaky, buttery croissants with a golden, crispy crust.

list.name: Éclair
list.description: Cream-filled pastry with a shiny chocolate glaze.

list.name: Apple Pie
list.description: Classic apple pie with a flaky crust and cinnamon-spiced apples.

list.name: Meringue Pie
list.description: Light, airy meringue topping over a tangy lemon filling.

list.name: Pecan Pie
list.description: Sweet and sticky pie filled with toasted pecans and syrup.

list.name: Fruit Tart
list.description: Delicate pastry shells filled with custard and topped with fresh fruit.

list.name: Blueberry Muffin
list.description: Soft muffins filled with fresh blueberries and a hint of lemon.

list.name: Banana Bread
list.description: Moist and flavorful bread made with ripe bananas and a dash of cinnamon.

list.name: Classic Cheesecake
list.description: Traditional creamy cheesecake with a buttery graham cracker crust.

list.name: Ricotta Cheesecake
list.description: Cheesecake made with smooth ricotta cheese and a touch of lemon.

list.name: Savory Cheese Pie
list.description: Savory pie made with creamy cheese, spinach, and herbs.

list.name: Spring
list.description: Celebrate the season of renewal with vibrant greens and blossoming flowers. Perfect for fresh beginnings.

list.name: Summer
list.description: Bring the warmth and brightness of sunny days with this card, ideal for carefree and cheerful moments.

list.name: Autumn
list.description: Capture the cozy charm of falling leaves and warm colors, perfect for celebrating seasonal traditions.

list.name: Winter
list.description: Embrace the frosty magic of snowflakes and cozy nights by the fire, a card full of wintery charm.

list.name: Golden
list.description: A luxurious card with a radiant golden touch, symbolizing success and celebration.

list.name: Silver
list.description: Elegant and sleek, this silver card is perfect for commemorating timeless moments.

list.name: Bronze
list.description: Warm and grounded, this bronze card adds a classic and earthy charm to any occasion.

list.name: The Barista's Best
list.description: Celebrate coffee artistry with a card designed for true coffee lovers and aficionados.

list.name: Espresso Express
list.description: Fast, bold, and full of energy – this card is ideal for those who live life in the fast lane.

list.name: Mug of Magic
list.description: A whimsical card that brings a sprinkle of enchantment to any coffee or tea lover's day.

list.name: The Daily Dip
list.description: Perfect for starting daily routines, this card reflects comfort and small daily indulgences.

list.name: Brew & Birthday Wishes
list.description: Send warm birthday wishes steeped in love and paired with the aroma of freshly brewed coffee.

list.name: Espresso Yourself - It's Your Day!
list.description: A playful and uplifting card to celebrate birthdays with a shot of personality and fun.

list.name: Sip, Sip Hooray!
list.description: Raise a mug and toast to another year of happiness and joy with this cheerful card.

list.name: Another Year, Another Cup!
list.description: Celebrate another trip around the sun with a card that reflects comfort and sweet memories.
